review: I was waiting there for almost 45  mins..dentist was technically good with the work  *** *** ** ************** she allowed a person (known patient) who came after me and charge also very high..
reply_text: Sorry about that Sir. The patient you mentioned as known was not known to me but had an appointment slot before you. I hope you  understand that some procedures take longer than expected, hence the delay. I again, regret the inconvenience and thank you for appreciating my good work.
